keywords: ['kora song', 'no other instruments', 'no voices', 'instrumental', 'waltz time', 'moderate tempo', 'folk song']
caption: This folk song features a kora being played in waltz time. This starts off with the strings being plucked in waltz time followed by a descending run. The waltz plucking is played twice more followed by another descending run. There are no other instruments in this song. There are no voices in this song. This is an instrumental song. This song can be sampled and played in a hip-hop song.
